title: Restaurant in Ogawa / UENOA
description: Creating a new face for the shopping district – This project involves the renovation of an 80-year-old house with a store in a corner of a shopping street in Ogawa-machi, Saitama Prefecture. The client's grandmother used to run a beauty salon here, and the client, who used to run an Italian restaurant in Tokyo, wanted to move there and open a restaurant.
